item.name: Two cursors to diagonal
item.appendix: * Simultaneous arrow keys presses to Home/End/PageUp/PageDown
* Hammerspoon uses Home/End/PageUp/PageDown as NW, NE, SW, SE

item.name: Shortcuts in Sublime Text
item.appendix: * Option_L + L to run toggle files side bar
* Option_L + P to run Package Control
* Option_L + T to run Sublime console
* Option_L + SPACE to run Goto Anything
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag:: SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::BACKQUOTE, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE

item.name: Shortcuts in Safari
item.appendix: * Option_R + B to show Extension Builder via Hammerspoon
* Option_R + S to bookmark page
* Option_R + E to empty caches
* Option_R + I to show web inspector
* Option_R + L to toggle bookmarks side bar
* Option_R + R to add page to read list
* Option_R + [ to show prev tab
* Option_R + ] to show next tab
* Option_R + SPACE to go to search bar
* Commmand_R + : to show web console

block.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::I, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::I, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Shortcuts in Terminal
item.appendix: * Command_L to send Tmux Prefix (Control + S)
* Command_R to send Vim MapLeader (,)
* Control_L + Tab to send Tmux Prefix (Control + S)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::NONE

item.name: Option_L + Key to simplify long shortcut keys in some Apps
item.appendix: * Option + V to move file, does Command + Option + V in Finder
* Option + V to paste without format, does Command + Shift + V in Evernote, Alternote
* Option + S to sync notes, does Command + Control + S in Evernote

block.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Shift + Delete to Forward Delete
item.appendix: * Only if no other modifiers are pressed

item.name: H,J,K,L direction control in Finder and iTunes
item.appendix: * H,J,K,L to cursor L,D,U,R for navigation
* Only applies when not editing text

item.name: Shifts to insert parentheses ()
item.appendix: * Shift_L to insert (
* Shift_R to insert )
* Shifts + Key will not insert ()
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Super + ConsumerKey does Super + StandardKey
item.appendix: * Used for Hammerspoon to map extra utilities
* ex: Super + BrightnessUp to Super + F1
